name: Game-U 3D Platformer
description:
Collect coins, defeat enemies, and make it to the blue goal!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar to jump, double jump, and wall jump when facing a wall
  • Left click to swing sword
  • Right click to throw water balloon
  • Esc to free your mouse cursor
  • F5 to restart

Created for Game-U LIVE. Watch recordings here!
